ingredients.ingredient: ½ (16 ounce) box dry fettuccine pasta
¼ cup butter, or to taste

cookingTips: Cook pasta to al dente—it will continue cooking slightly from residual heat
Reserve ½ cup pasta water before draining to loosen pesto if needed
Add pesto to warm pasta off heat to preserve fresh basil flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Do you have fresh pesto or would you use jarred? Fresh will offer more vibrant flavor.
